Title: View All Products - Positive Case
Description: Verify that an admin can retrieve a complete list of products with all details and inventory status.
Acceptance_Criteria: Admin can GET /api/products and receive a list with all product fields (id, name, description, price, category, images, stockQuantity).
Each product includes inventory status (stockQuantity).
Response matches OpenAPI schema and includes at least one product.

Title: View All Products - Empty Catalog
Description: Verify response when there are no products in the catalog.
Acceptance_Criteria: GET /api/products returns an empty array when no products exist.
Response schema is valid.

Title: Add New Product - Positive Case
Description: Verify that an admin can add a new product with valid details.
Acceptance_Criteria: POST /api/products with valid payload (name, description, price, category, images, stockQuantity) creates a product.
Response contains created product with all fields, matching OpenAPI schema.
GET /api/products/{id} returns the newly created product.

Title: Add New Product - Missing Required Fields
Description: Verify error handling when required fields are missing.
Acceptance_Criteria: POST /api/products with missing name, price, or category returns 400 Bad Request.
Error message specifies missing fields.
No product is created.

Title: Add New Product - Invalid Field Values
Description: Verify validation for invalid field values (e.g., negative price, empty name).
Acceptance_Criteria: POST /api/products with negative price or empty name returns 400 Bad Request.
Error message specifies invalid fields.
No product is created.

Title: Add New Product - Duplicate Name
Description: Verify behavior when adding a product with a duplicate name.
Acceptance_Criteria: POST /api/products with a name already in use returns 409 Conflict or similar validation error.
Error message specifies duplication.

Title: Update Existing Product - Positive Case
Description: Verify that an admin can update an existing product and changes are reflected.
Acceptance_Criteria: PUT /api/products/{id} with valid updated details modifies the product.
GET /api/products/{id} returns updated product.
Update is reflected in GET /api/products.

Title: Update Existing Product - Nonexistent Product
Description: Verify error handling when updating a product that does not exist.
Acceptance_Criteria: PUT /api/products/{invalid_id} returns 404 Not Found.
Error message specifies product not found.

Title: Update Existing Product - Invalid Field Values
Description: Verify validation for invalid updates (e.g., negative price, empty name).
Acceptance_Criteria: PUT /api/products/{id} with invalid values returns 400 Bad Request.
Error message specifies invalid fields.
Product is not updated.

Title: Delete Product - Mark as Inactive
Description: Verify that an admin can mark a product as inactive and it is not visible to customers.
Acceptance_Criteria: DELETE /api/products/{id} marks product as inactive or removes from DB.
GET /api/products does not return inactive product.
GET /api/products/{id} returns 404 or status indicates inactive.

Title: Delete Product - Nonexistent Product
Description: Verify error handling when deleting a product that does not exist.
Acceptance_Criteria: DELETE /api/products/{invalid_id} returns 404 Not Found.
Error message specifies product not found.

Title: Update Inventory Levels - Positive Case
Description: Verify that an admin can update inventory levels and see availability updated.
Acceptance_Criteria: PUT /api/products/{id} with updated stockQuantity modifies inventory.
GET /api/products/{id} returns updated stockQuantity.
GET /api/products reflects inventory change.

Title: Update Inventory Levels - Negative Stock
Description: Verify validation when updating inventory to a negative value.
Acceptance_Criteria: PUT /api/products/{id} with negative stockQuantity returns 400 Bad Request.
Error message specifies invalid stock.

Title: Boundary Case - Maximum Field Lengths
Description: Verify behavior when product fields are at maximum allowed lengths (e.g., name, description, category).
Acceptance_Criteria: POST /api/products with fields at max length is accepted if within schema limits.
POST /api/products with fields exceeding max length returns 400 Bad Request.

Title: Edge Case - Zero Inventory
Description: Verify behavior when product inventory is set to zero.
Acceptance_Criteria: PUT /api/products/{id} with stockQuantity = 0 updates inventory.
Product is shown as out-of-stock in GET /api/products.

Title: Search Products - By Category
Description: Verify that admin can search for products by category.
Acceptance_Criteria: GET /api/products/category/{category} returns products matching category.
Response matches OpenAPI schema.

Title: Search Products - Invalid Category
Description: Verify behavior when searching for a non-existent category.
Acceptance_Criteria: GET /api/products/category/{invalid_category} returns empty array.
Response schema is valid.

Title: View Single Product - Positive Case
Description: Verify that admin can view details of a single product.
Acceptance_Criteria: GET /api/products/{id} returns product details matching OpenAPI schema.

Title: View Single Product - Nonexistent Product
Description: Verify error handling when viewing a product that does not exist.
Acceptance_Criteria: GET /api/products/{invalid_id} returns 404 Not Found.
Error message specifies product not found.
